name: What'smyBMI
0:
”Alexa open simon's b. m. i. calculator”
”What's my b.m.i.?”
”Calculate my b.m.i.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: simon's b. m. i. calculator
des: Try asking Alexa to calculate your B.M.I. You can specify your height in feet, inches or centimeters. You can specify your weight in pounds, kilos or stone.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
